message.aboutDescription: Global trade Industries (GTI) is company specialized in providing business solution, product management and business equipment, together with our import and export services globally
message.weAre: We are a company specialized in providing business solution, product management and business equipment, together with our import and export services globally.
message.managementLevel: Management of products and equipment at an international level
message.globalCreated: Global Trade Industries (GTI) is a company created in November 2015.
message.openedWarehouse: We have just opened our new warehouse in Miami, FL on October 2016.
message.ourMission: Our mission is to offer the best services for business solution to companies when it comes to product management import & export services, by optimizing and lowering costs of our clients when managing a product in the international markets.
message.ourVision: Our vision is to be the best service provider in offering management of products and services for international import & export, always offering a competitive advantage to our customers.
message.subContact: If you have any question in how we can help your business, contact us directly by filling the following form.
